thread.title: LESLEY GOODMAN (swim mom from Houston, Texas)
thread.title_full: Zodee reviewed by LESLEY GOODMAN (swim mom from Houston, Texas)

author: LESLEY GOODMAN (swim mom from Houston, Texas)
title: LESLEY GOODMAN (swim mom from Houston, Texas)
text: We order my sons favorite swim suits from Zodee. He has been wearing Funky Trunks for years, however, the Funky Trunks website did not have his size. Zodee had everything we needed. Shipping was quick to the United States and communication in reference to an item that was out of stock, was quick as well. In addition, they sent the cutest little Koala Bear in it's own pair of Funky Trunks! What a delightful surprise! Thank you for such great customer service.
